articles.description: Where is Xur this week? Head to Nessus for some Exotic items from your favorite merchant. This week’s Xur inventory includes Hard Light, Gwisin Vest, Hallowfire Heart, and Apotheosis Veil.
articles.content: The weekly Exotic item merchant, Xur, hangs out in random locations around the world of Destiny. In Destiny 2, he can appear all over the map, as well as inside the Tower. This week, you can find Xur on Nessus, north of the Watchers Grave landing zone, standi… [+2455 chars]
